member.summary: Contains the budget line item information for a working budget.

member.summary: The budget line item GL account ID.

member.summary: The formatted budget line item GL account.

member.summary: The General Ledger class for the budget account.

member.summary: The budget officer ID.

member.summary: The budget officer name.

member.summary: Contains information for a budget reporting unit.

member.summary: The reporting unit ID.

member.summary: The reporting unit description.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.BudgetManagement.BudgetReportingUnit.AuthorizationDate
member.summary: The reporting unit authorization date.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.BudgetManagement.BudgetReportingUnit.HasAuthorizationDatePassed
member.summary: Boolean indicator of whether the authorization date has passed.

member.name: T:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.BudgetManagement.BudgetStatus
member.summary: This enumeration contains all of the status values that are available for a budget.

member.name: F:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.BudgetManagement.BudgetStatus.New
member.summary: This is a new budget that has never been generated.

member.name: F:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.BudgetManagement.BudgetStatus.Generated
member.summary: This is a budget that was in the generation process but did not complete. Some error happened and the generation process aborted before completion.

member.name: F:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.BudgetManagement.BudgetStatus.Posted
member.summary: This is a budget that has been posted to the General Ledger.

member.name: F:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.BudgetManagement.BudgetStatus.Working
member.summary: This is a budget that is in the development process. It may be generated more times before it is posted.

member.summary: Component query filter criteria.

member.summary: Component name.

member.summary: A list of individual component filter values.

member.summary: A list of component filter range objects.

member.summary: Component range filter criteria.

member.summary: Component range start value.

member.summary: Component range end value.

member.name: T:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.BudgetManagement.LineItem
member.summary: Contains either a Budget line item or a subtotal but not both.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.BudgetManagement.LineItem.SequenceNumber
member.summary: The sequence number for this line item within the working budget. It goes from 1 to the number of returned items which will be the number of requested budget line items for the page plus, if the user requested any subtotals, any number of subtotals to be displayed on the page.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.BudgetManagement.LineItem.BudgetLineItem
member.summary: A budget line item for the working budget.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.BudgetManagement.LineItem.SubtotalLineItem
member.summary: A subtotal line item for the working budget.

member.name: T:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.BudgetManagement.SortSubtotalComponentQueryCriteria
member.summary: Sort and Subtotal Component query filter criteria.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.BudgetManagement.SortSubtotalComponentQueryCriteria.SubtotalName
member.summary: The subtotal name.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.BudgetManagement.SortSubtotalComponentQueryCriteria.SubtotalType
member.summary: Contains BO for budget officer or a GL for an account component/subcomponent.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.BudgetManagement.SortSubtotalComponentQueryCriteria.Order
member.summary: Order of the Component.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.BudgetManagement.SortSubtotalComponentQueryCriteria.IsDisplaySubTotal
member.summary: Flag to determine whether subtotalling is also required/displayed for this sort component.

member.name: T:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.BudgetManagement.SubtotalLineItem
member.summary: Contains a subtotal line item information for a working budget.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.BudgetManagement.SubtotalLineItem.SubtotalType
member.summary: Contains BO for budget officer or a GL for an account component/subcomponent.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.BudgetManagement.SubtotalLineItem.SubtotalOrder
member.summary: The order of the subtotal.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.BudgetManagement.SubtotalLineItem.SubtotalName
member.summary: If a GL type subtotal, the name of the GL component or, if a BO type "Budget Officer".

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.BudgetManagement.SubtotalLineItem.SubtotalValue
member.summary: The value of the GL component/subcomponent or the budget officer ID.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.BudgetManagement.SubtotalLineItem.SubtotalDescription
member.summary: If the subtotal type is BO, the name of the budget officer. If the subtotal type is GL, the component or subcomponent description.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.BudgetManagement.SubtotalLineItem.SubtotalBaseBudgetAmount
member.summary: Base budget amount for the subtotal line item.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.BudgetManagement.SubtotalLineItem.SubtotalWorkingAmount
member.summary: Working amount for the subtotal line item.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.BudgetManagement.SubtotalLineItem.SubtotalBudgetComparables
member.summary: List of subtotal budget comparables amounts for the subtotal line item.

member.name: T:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.BudgetManagement.WorkingBudget
member.summary: Contains the working budget information for a budget officer.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.BudgetManagement.WorkingBudget.BudgetLineItems
member.summary: The working budget ID.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.BudgetManagement.WorkingBudget.TotalLineItems
member.summary: Total number of budget line items for working budget.

member.name: T:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.BudgetManagement.WorkingBudget2
member.summary: Contains the working budget information for the user.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.BudgetManagement.WorkingBudget2.TotalLineItems
member.summary: Total number of budget line items for working budget.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.BudgetManagement.WorkingBudget2.LineItems
member.summary: List of line items for the working budget. It contains as many budget line items as requested per page plus as many subtotals are present in that page.

member.name: T:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.BudgetManagement.WorkingBudgetQueryCriteria
member.summary: Filter criteria for the working budget.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.BudgetManagement.WorkingBudgetQueryCriteria.Ids
member.summary: List of IDs. Only 0 or 1 IDs will be accepted.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.BudgetManagement.WorkingBudgetQueryCriteria.StartLineItem
member.summary: Start position of the line items to return.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.BudgetManagement.WorkingBudgetQueryCriteria.LineItemCount
member.summary: Total number of budget line items in the working budget.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.BudgetManagement.WorkingBudgetQueryCriteria.BudgetOfficerIds
member.summary: List of budget officer IDs to filter the results.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.BudgetManagement.WorkingBudgetQueryCriteria.BudgetReportingUnitIds
member.summary: List of budget reporting unit IDs to filter the results.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.BudgetManagement.WorkingBudgetQueryCriteria.IncludeBudgetReportingUnitsChildren
member.summary: Whether to also include any descendants for the selected reporting units.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.BudgetManagement.WorkingBudgetQueryCriteria.ComponentCriteria
member.summary: A list of component filter criteria.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.BudgetManagement.WorkingBudgetQueryCriteria.SortSubtotalComponentQueryCriteria
member.summary: A list of sort/subtotal component filter criteria.
